Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and preferences. Given its exceptional quality and features, I am confident it will meet your expectations and potentially exceed them. I am offering this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $10,000. This is an excellent value considering the product's worth to you is estimated at $8,000. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
